This Perfume is Awesome.

Capturing the spirit of an intense love affair, YSL beaute introduces 'Mon Paris' perfume a new expression of love today, inspired by the city of lovers, 'Paris'. 'Mon Paris' is a fragrance which urges you to seize the moment transcend the present.
